page.title: 08FARMING
page.content: {FARM MACHINERY. We've been looking at farms and all the machinery. Some people hire things like Mr Shapcot, he hires a silager and owns a potato planter, silage trailers, a plough, a buck rake, a forager, a yardscraper, a roller, a drag, a hayturner, a grass cutter, a dung spreader, a Land Rover, a horse box, a link box and 2 tractors. Then Mr Woolacot has 8 tractors, 1 fertilizer, 7 trailers, 1 roller, 1 plough, 3 drags, 1 bailer, 1 combine, 1 corn grinder, 1 elevator, 1 cattle trailer, 1 horse box, 1 link box, 1 pressure washer, 1 buckrake,1 yardscraper, 1 dung spreader, 1 Land Rover, 2 hay turners. Mr Borden has 3 tractors, 2 hay turners, 1 bailer, 2 elevators, 1 link box, 1 manure spreader, 1 loader, 1 grass cutter.By Jeff,Tim and Stuart.
